Interface_name: HTTP based on express in javascript
Instruction:
Task Description: Create a class that implements a simple HTTP server using Express.js framework to provide a FOAAS (F*** Off As A Service) style API, which generates humorous responses to HTTP requests.

Class Description: The FOAAS class creates an Express application that handles various HTTP requests and returns humorous responses in a standardized format. It includes middleware configuration, route handling, and server management capabilities.

Attributes:
- app: [Object] - The Express application instance
- operations: [Object] - A dictionary storing available API operations
- operationsArray: [Array] - An array containing information about available operations

Methods:
- constructor(options) -> [void] - Initializes the Express application, configures middleware, and sets up default routes
  - options: [Object] - Configuration options for the application (currently unused in reference implementation)
  
- sendIndex(req, res) -> [void] - Sends the index.html file as response
  - req: [Object] - Express request object
  - res: [Object] - Express response object
  
- start(port) -> [void] - Starts the HTTP server on the specified port and performs initialization checks
  - port: [Number] - The port number to listen on
  
- output(req, res, message, subtitle) -> [void] - Formats and sends the response message
  - req: [Object] - Express request object
  - res: [Object] - Express response object
  - message: [String] - The main response message
  - subtitle: [String] - The secondary response message (typically containing the requester's name)
